welcome_message_body: Welcome to Overijse, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and delicious locally-made chocolate! We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and discovering all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and connectivity.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Deurne/ Antwerp Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
